metadata.description: Advanced verbs - specialized actions and complex constructions

present.spanish: Me preocupo mucho por mi familia.
present.english: I worry a lot about my family.
present.subject: yo

present.spanish: Te preocupas demasiado por el trabajo.
present.english: You (informal) worry too much about work.
present.subject: tú

present.spanish: Te preocupás por cosas que no podés controlar.
present.english: You worry about things you can't control.
present.subject: vos

present.spanish: Se preocupa por el futuro de sus hijos.

present.subject: ella

present.spanish: Se preocupa por el futuro de sus hijos.
present.english: You (formal) worry about your children's future.
present.subject: usted
